Title: Not using latest stable version of OpenZeppelin Contracts
Content:
An old version of OpenZeppelin Contracts [is being used in the project](https://github.com/dydxprotocol/perpetual/blob/c5e2b0e58aaf532d2c8b1f658d1df2f6a3385318/package.json#L47). Since version 2.5.0 has been recently released with improvements such as [gas optimizations in the ReentrancyGuard contract](https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#improvements), consider bumping the library to its latest stable version.


**Update:** Fixed via [PR #132](https://github.com/dydxprotocol/perpetual/pull/132). Note that a custom reentrancy guard is being used for compatibility with the upgradable proxy pattern.
